attributes.action: stop the creation of central crossroads over Sloane Square, Chelsea.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Plans have been proposed by the Mayor of London Ken Livingston to build a four lane crossroad system over the famous Sloane Square in Chelsea.

This would mean the destruction of a fine London landmark, on what seems to be a mission by Ken Livingston to ruin London.
